PluginData.Tooltip: Grid management and REST API for Space Engineers servers
PluginData.Description:
SE Grid Manager is a Torch/Client plugin for managing grids (structures) and providing a REST API for Space Engineers servers.
- Torch-based management tool for Space Engineers servers - Provides HTTP listener and REST API (/ping, /Update-Grid, etc.) - Query user grid ownership by SteamId and integrate with external systems
